1- Dotplot

```{r dotplot_CPR, echo=FALSE, out.width = "30%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 7,fig.show = "hold"}
for(domain in names(dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]])){
 
dataPlot <-  dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]][[domain]]
if(nrow(dataPlot)>0){
p <- enrichplot::dotplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15) + 
  ggplot2::ggtitle(paste0(listname, "\nEnrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
print(p)
 }
else{print(paste0(listname, " - in domain: ", domain, " - There was no enriched term found in this setting."))}
}
```

2- Heatplot

```{r Heatplot, echo=FALSE, out.width = "30%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 12, fig.height = 7,fig.show = "hold"}
for(domain in names(dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]])){
dataPlot <-  dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]][[domain]]
if(nrow(dataPlot)>0){
p <-  enrichplot::heatplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15, foldChange = log2FC_vect) + 
                                   ggplot2::labs(fill="log2FC") + 
                                   ggplot2::scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "white", high = "red", midpoint = 0) +
                                   ggplot2::theme(axis.text.y = ggplot2::element_text(size = 10)) + 
                                   ggplot2::ggtitle(paste0(listname, " - Enrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
suppressMessages(print(p))# delete warnings for scale fill replacement
 }
else{print(paste0(listname, " - in domain: ", domain, " - There was no enriched term found in this setting."))}
}
```


3- Cnetplot

```{r CnetPlot, echo=FALSE, out.width = "30%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 12, fig.height = 7,fig.show = "hold"}
for(domain in names(dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]])){
dataPlot <-  dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]][[domain]]
if(nrow(dataPlot)>0){
p <- enrichplot::cnetplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15, foldChange = log2FC_vect, node_label = "category") + 
  ggplot2::guides(colour=ggplot2::guide_colourbar(title = "log2FC")) +
  ggplot2::scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "white", high = "red", midpoint = 0) + 
  ggplot2::ggtitle(paste0(listname, " - Enrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
  suppressMessages(print(p)) # delete warnings for scale fill replacement
 }
else{print(paste0(listname, " - in domain: ", domain, " - There was no enriched term found in this setting."))}
}
```


4- Table

```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = "100%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

dataPlot <- list()

for(domain in names(dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]])){
  if(length(domain) != 0){
    tmp <- dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]][[ontology]]$enrichResult[[listname]][[domain]]
    tmp@result$domain <- rep(domain,dim(tmp@result)[1])
    dataPlot[[domain]] <- tmp@result[tmp@result$p.adjust < tmp@pvalueCutoff, ] |> dplyr::select(!c("geneID", "qvalue"))
  }
}

#DT::datatable(dataPlot, # sometimes it prints non significant results...
#                    rownames = FALSE,
#                    options = list(rownames = FALSE, pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20), scrollX = T))
#

# Bind results domain

if(length(dataPlot) != 0){
  dataPlot.rbind <- dataPlot |> purrr::reduce(rbind)
  
  dataPlot.rbind[,5:7]<-signif(dataPlot.rbind[,5:6],3)
  
  reactable::reactable(dataPlot.rbind,rownames = FALSE,
            showSortable = TRUE,
            bordered = TRUE,
            defaultPageSize = 5, searchable = TRUE, paginationType = "simple")
}

```
